original_text: Each year you and your family are to eat them in the presence of the Lord your God at the place he will choose.
korean_text: 너와 네 가족은 매년 여호와께서 택하신 곳 네 하나님 여호와 앞에서 먹을지니라

sentences.original_text: Each year you and your family are to eat them
sentences.korean_translation: 매년 당신과 당신의 가족은 그것들을 먹어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: in the presence of the Lord your God
at the place he will choose
